title: The Italian NHS: What Lessons to Draw from COVID-19?
text: The Italian NHS: What Lessons to Draw from COVID-19?

similar.title: COVID-19 safety in maternity care: lessons for the whole NHS.
text: COVID-19 safety in maternity care: lessons for the whole NHS.

John Tingle, Lecturer in Law, Birmingham Law School, University of Birmingham, discusses some recent reports in maternity care, which can be seen to also to have general application across all clinical specialities.
abstract: John Tingle, Lecturer in Law, Birmingham Law School, University of Birmingham, discusses some recent reports in maternity care, which can be seen to also to have general application across all clinical specialities.

similar.title: Are there positive lessons for Italy's NHS resulting from the Covid-19 pandemic?
text: Are there positive lessons for Italy's NHS resulting from the Covid-19 pandemic?

The authors evaluate the importance of prevention measures and health care from their own experience and briefly analyse the factors that may have contributed to the rapid spread of Covid-19 in Italy, and hope this will feed into appropriate and new and improved health policies.
abstract: The authors evaluate the importance of prevention measures and health care from their own experience and briefly analyse the factors that may have contributed to the rapid spread of Covid-19 in Italy, and hope this will feed into appropriate and new and improved health policies.
